text: Ronald Louis Schwary (May 23, 1944 â€“ July 2, 2020) was an American producer and director. He was known for producing Ordinary People (for which he won an Academy Award for Best Picture), Sabrina, Havana and Random Hearts. He was born in The Dalles, Oregon. Schwary died July 2, 2020 in Hollywood, California from multiple system atrophy at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple system atrophy Category:American movie producers Category:American movie directors Category:Businesspeople from Oregon
title: Ronald L. Schwary
